website_summaries.verdict: Unique style makes this complete set a great addition to any kitchen collection.
pros: Uniquely styled handle design and fun barrel carrying case make these a great party accessory
cons: Barrel case takes up more counter space

customer_reviews.title: unique cheese cutter display
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised it was that big but i really do like it just because its different. will make a great addition to the cutting board that i am also giving as a house warming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little sets
customer_reviews.text: So cute bought for pioneer wagon display then going to gift out afterwards.dual purpose. Nice little knifes for our cheese eaters.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful as a gift and at home! Doesn’t take much space and it got 4 cute little knifes. That’s all you need! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Pary al Zahawi

customer_reviews.title: The barrel was bigger than expected (read the measurements) but they are very pretty and she loves them
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my daughter. The barrel was bigger than expected (read the measurements) but they are very pretty and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: ladytichborne

customer_reviews.title: Not as high of quality as I expected. One ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as high of quality as I expected. One knife the blade was not inserted into the handle straight. Smaller than I envisioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, decorative
customer_reviews.text: I always get so many compliments on this set. It easily packs up for charcuterie on the go and it’s always the center of attention when unpacking. High quality inside and out, can be used for all aspects of the Charcuterie board so guests can make their plates. When not in use it sits on our kitchen counter as a decorative piece. I will be purchasing more of these as gift items for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: gave this as a wedding gift-they loved it; super cute & different
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking set. I like the barrel design. I use this product for my outdoor brunch picnics. I use it to spread cream cheese and other spreads on bread/bagel. I love the fact that there are inserts inside the barrel to prevent the spreaders from rattling around. Looks chic and super cute. I did purchase this item in exchange for my honest review. The discounted rate does not affect my standards in reviewing any produc
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: This little thing looks just adorable on the table with my wine and a hunk ...
customer_reviews.text: I got my little cheese barrel and quickly took off for the winery! This little thing looks just adorable on the table with my wine and a hunk of cheese! Lots of folks came by to comment on it as the barrel is the perfect setting for a winery! The cheese tools are sharp and quite handy as they're not huge. This would make a great gift for a wine drinker. It would also make a fun gift for a young couple getting married as part of a picnic basket themed gift. It does take up more room than just storing a few little cheese accessories, but it's definitely a statement piece and makes for a fun talking point.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ciardiello

customer_reviews.title: Super cute set
customer_reviews.text: Super cute set. I've been using this for a weekly picnic that I have. Super cute yet sturdy as well. I love that there are inserts inside the barrel for each individual knife/spreader so that it's not rattling when I carry it around. Definitely a keeper! I did purchase this item in exchange for my honest review. The discounted rate does not affect my standards in reviewing any product.
customer_reviews.author: EKAY724

customer_reviews.title: Love My Cheese Knives!
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this set. Each of the knives are sharp and cut cheese very nicely. The barrel is cute enough to keep out on your buffet along with the knives and each knife works they way it's supposed to for each of the different cheeses I tried. The handles feel a bit like wine corks and are comfortable to hold. I was home alone when the product arrived so I treated myself to a private cheese and fruit snack party and watched the sun go down. Very nice way to end a day. I purchased this product at a discount but the opinion is my own and unbiased.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

product_meta.title: La Cote Cheese Knife Set Stainless Steel Blade (4 Pc Resin Knife Set in Pine Wood Mini Barrel)
product_meta.description: The La Côte cheese & spreader sets are truly a one of a kind item. Whether you are slicing or spreading cheeses, these knives will not only facilitate your tastes but those of your guests as well. Impress your guests with this unique accomplice to any cheese spread, or house party, or give it as a gift to a friend or that special someone. Any cheese-lover will thank you. Hand washing is always recommended. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed. Try it risk-free full satisfaction guaranteed or your money back. La Côte Cheese Sets have been built with Perfection in Mind Combining Beauty and Quality with Extreme Performance.
feature_bullets: One-of-a-kind 4 Piece Cheese Knife Set Includes: A dual pronged serving fork, a spreading utensil for crumbly cheese, a cheese slicer for hard cheese and a rounded knife that can be used for Brie or softer cheeses in Mini Barrel

Set comes complete with a beautifully designed hand crafted, carbonized pine wood mini barrel used to display & store each knife and unique wine cork patterned handle. Pine Wood Mini Barrel was designed with a vintage and rustic feel to it.
2 1/5” patterned and carved resin handle in wine cork shape - Overall Cheese Knives 5.1”, 5.3”, 4.9” Over Cheese Fork 5.3”

Impress your guests with this unique accomplice to any cheese spread. Compact enough to add on top of any Cheese Board or serving Board Makes a Perfect House Warming Gift as well as Great for wine and dinner parties
100% Satisfaction Guaranteed or your money back. Try it risk free! La Côte Cheese Knife Sets have been built with Perfection in Mind Combining Beauty and High Quality with Extreme Performance.
